newVersion.title: {{name}} new version
newVersion.body: Version {{version}} of {{name}} has been released, feel free to update your project !

errors.notDirectory: The selected path does not correspond to an existing directory
errors.noPackageJson: The selected path corresponds to a directory which does not contain a "package.json" file
errors.nameAlreadyUsed: The selected name is already used for another project.

errors.fileDoesNotExist: Path "{{path}}" doesn't correspond to an existing file
errors.errorWhileReadingFile: An error occurred while reading "{{path}}". Please verify the existance of the file and its read right
